mapper.select: select m.member_number , s.store_number , s.store_title , s.store_price , b.basket_cnt, (select sf.store_file_system_name from tbl_store_file sf where store_number = sf.store_number limit 0,1) from tbl_member m join tbl_basket b on m.member_number = #{memberNumber} and m.member_number = b.member_number join tbl_store s on b.store_number = s.store_number
